org.graalvm.python.embedding.VirtualFileSystem.Builder

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.allowHostIO(VirtualFileSystem.HostIO hostIO)
    Determines if and how much host IO is allowed outside the VirtualFileSystem.
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.caseInsensitive(boolean value)
    Sets the file system to be case-insensitive.
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.extractFilter(Predicate<Path> filter)
    This filter applied to files in the virtual filesystem treats them as symlinks to real files in the host filesystem.
    static VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.newBuilder()
    Creates a builder for constructing a VirtualFileSystem with a custom configuration.
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.resourceDirectory(String directory)
    Sets the root directory of the virtual filesystem within Java resources.
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.resourceLoadingClass(Class<?> c)
    By default, virtual filesystem resources are loaded by delegating to VirtualFileSystem.class.getResource(name).
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.unixMountPoint(String unixMountPoint)
    The mount point for the virtual filesystem on Unices.
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder
    VirtualFileSystem.Builder.windowsMountPoint(String windowsMountPoint)
    The mount point for the virtual filesystem on Windows.
